subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Devin Gardner and Jeremy Gallon, wearing the jerseys of past Wolverine greats, led Michigan past Notre Dame in the final game between the rivals in Ann Arbor for at least the next decade.
snippet: Devin Gardner and Jeremy Gallon, wearing the jerseys of past Wolverine greats, led Michigan past Notre Dame in the final game between the rivals in Ann Arbor for at least the next decade.
